api_key.description: Binance API key generated in the Binance account setup stage

api_secret_key.description: Binance secret key generated in the Binance account setup stage

current_coin.description: This is your starting coin of choice. This should be one of the coins from your supported coin list. If you want to start from your bridge currency, leave this field empty - the bot will select a random coin from your supported coin list and buy it

bridge.description: Your bridge currency of choice. Notice that different bridges will allow different sets of supported coins. For example, there may be a Binance particular-coin/USDT pair but no particular-coin/BUSD pair

tld.description: 'com' or 'us', depending on your region. Default is 'com'

hourToKeepScoutHistory.description: Controls how many hours of scouting values are kept in the database. After the amount of time specified has passed, the information will be deleted

scout_multiplier.description: Controls the value by which the difference between the current state of coin ratios and previous state of ratios is multiplied. For bigger values, the bot will wait for bigger margins to arrive before making a trade

scout_sleep_time.description: Controls how many seconds are waited between each scout

strategy.description: The trading strategy to use. See binance_trade_bot/strategies for more information. Options: default or multiple_coins

buy_timeout.description: Controls how many minutes to wait before cancelling a limit order (buy/sell) and returning to 'scout' mode. 0 means that the order will never be cancelled prematurely

sell_timeout.description: Controls how many minutes to wait before cancelling a limit order (buy/sell) and returning to 'scout' mode. 0 means that the order will never be cancelled prematurely
